snippet: Like last year, Duke is led by a star freshman and had an early A.C.C. tournament exit, but the Blue Devils are hoping for a better tournament than they had in 2014, when they lost their opening game.
abstract: Duke, among teams from South competing in NCAA men's basketball tournament, enters competition for second consecutive year having failed to win Atlantic Coast Conference; hopes to avoid early elimination from tournament, as happened last year; other NCAA tournament matchups among teams from South discussed.

byline.original: By VIV BERNSTEIN and ZACH SCHONBRUN

lead_paragraph: Like last year, Duke is led by a star freshman and had an early A.C.C. tournament exit, but the Blue Devils are hoping for a better tournament than they had in 2014, when they lost their opening game.

headline.main: Duke, Again Led by Young Players, Hopes to Avoid Last Year’s Fate
